categories: Category:Battles of the Invasion of Naboo

nodes.text: Otoh Langua, a small Gungan city on the planet Naboo, was attacked, like most Gungan cities, by the droid army of the Trade Federation during the Invasion of Naboo. Oma Prumba, a militiagung survivor of the attack, later participated in the Battle of Naboo and recounted her experiences.

During the Trade Federation's occupation of the planet Naboo and after the capture of Theed, OOM command battle droid Commander OOM-9 sent troops to investigate the various Gungan villages on the planet.
